review: I love all of the variety of shows/movies available, but I'm disappointed with the connection problems I keep seeming to have. I have owned this product for less than a month and I feel like I keep reconnecting to our wireless again and again. Our router is less than a year old, so it shouldn't be a problem. I have connected the TV stick to it's adapter and into the wall so it has the best connection and it still seems to lose connection off and on. I'm a little disappointed but I wanted a product that had Hulu Plus, Netflix, etc. all in one place because I'm over cable! Perfect for what I need, but I'm not sure how to fix the connection issue.
author: April Keeley

review: We have had our stick for 3 months now. I so want to give this 5 stars. I love that I can watch TV for about $35/month instead of the $150 I used to pay Comcast (we have Sling w/ HBO). But, I can't give it all my stars since  have to reboot the thing all the time, especially when using Sling or the PBS app.These are what we primarily use with the Stick--it can be frustrating. Please update the firmware. I have a similar request for Sling.On a happy note, I am glad that I no longer have to dedicate my laptop to HDMI or Chromecast when I want to watch a movie or show on Prime.
author: M. White "Mel"

review: VERY VERY HAPPY with this fire stick!!!!! I honestly like it much better than the full size version...less clutter and this even appears to stream faster, I have not had any re buffering issues at all...will for sure purchase some for Christmas gifts this year and also purchase more for myself once the other streaming devices I have give up! Wont ever purchase any other type of device other than the Amazon fire! LOVE LOVE LOVE IT! And super simple easy set up! Which is a plus!
